member.name: T:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2
member.summary: The CHARFORMAT2 structure contains information about character formatting in a rich edit control.

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2.cbSize
member.summary: Specifies the size, in bytes, of the structure.

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2.dwMask
member.summary: Specifies the parts of the CHARFORMAT2 structure that contain valid information.

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2.dwEffects
member.summary: A set of bit flags that specify character effects.

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2.yHeight
member.summary: Specifies the character height, in twips

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2.yOffset
member.summary: Character offset from the baseline, in twips

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2.bPitchAndFamily
member.summary: Specifies the font family and pitch

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2.szFaceName
member.summary: A null-terminated character array specifying the font name

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2.sSpacing
member.summary: Horizontal space between letters, in twips

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2.LCID
member.summary: A 32-bit locale identifier that contains a language identifier in the lower word and a sorting identifier and reserved value in the upper word

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2.dwReserved
member.summary: Reserved; the value must be zero.

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2.wKerning
member.summary: Value of the font size, above which to kern the character

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARFORMAT2.bRevAuthor
member.summary: An index that identifies the author making a revision

member.summary: Задать смещение символа по вертикали, относительно базовой линиии

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.EM_FORMATRANGE
member.summary: The EM_FORMATRANGE message formats a range of text in a rich edit control for a specific device.

member.name: T:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.RECT
member.summary: This structure defines the coordinates of the upper-left and lower-right corners of a rectangle.

member.name: T:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARRANGE
member.summary: The CHARRANGE structure specifies a range of characters in a rich edit control.

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARRANGE.cpMin
member.summary: Character position index immediately preceding the first character in the range.

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.CHARRANGE.cpMax
member.summary: Character position immediately following the last character in the range.

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.FORMATRANGE.rc
member.summary: Area to render to. Units are measured in twips.

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.FORMATRANGE.rcPage
member.summary: Entire area of rendering device. Units are measured in twips.

member.name: F:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.FORMATRANGE.chrg
member.summary: CHARRANGE structure that specifies the range of text to format.

member.name: M:TriadPad.RichTextBoxEx.FormatRange(System.Boolean,System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculate or render the contents of our RichTextBox for printing
member.param: If true, only the calculation is performed, otherwise the text is rendered as well
The PrintPageEventArgs object from the PrintPage event
Index of first character to be printed
Index of last character to be printed
member.returns: (Index of last character that fitted on the page) + 1
